dividends: {'msg': '', 'title': 'Dividend', 'header': ['Record Date', 'Ex-Date', 'Dividend Percentage', 'Details'], 'data': [['16-05-2025', '16-05-2025', '1590%', 'Pursuant to Regulation 43 and Regulation 30 (6) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, the Central Board of the Bank, has declared a Dividend of ? 15.90 per equity share (1590%) for the financial ear ended 31.03.2025. The record date for determining the eligibility of members entitled to receive dividend on equity shares is Friday, 16.05.2025 and dividend payment date is fixed as 30.05.2025.'], ['22-05-2024', '22-05-2024', '1370%', 'Outcome of Board Meeting Further, pursuant to Regulation 43 and Regulation 30 (6) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations,2OlS we inform that the Central Board of the Bank, at its Meeting held today, has declared a Dividend of t 13.70 per equity share (1370%) for the financial year ended 31.03.2024, The record date for determining the eligibility of members entitled to receive dividend on equity shares is Wednesday,22.05.2024 and Dividend payment date is fixed as 05.06.2024.'], ['31-05-2023', '31-05-2023', '1130%', 'Further, pursuant to Regulation 43 and Regulation 30 (6), we advise that the Central Board of the Bank, at its Meeting held on 18 th May, 2023, has declared a Dividend of Rs. 11.30 per equity share (1130%) for the financial year ended 31st March, 2023. The date of payment of Dividend is fixed on 14 th June, 2023 and the dividend warrants will be dispatched before the date of payment, which will be payable, in India, at par at all branches of State Bank of India, irrespective of the amount.'], ['26-05-2022', '25-05-2022', '710%', 'State Bank of India has informed BSE that the Central Board of the Bank at its meeting held on May 13, 2022, inter alia, has declared a Dividend of Rs. 7.10 per equity share (710%) for the financial year ended March 31, 2022.'], ['04-06-2021', '03-06-2021', '400%', 'State Bank of India has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on May 21, 2021, inter alia, has declared a Dividend of Rs. 4.00 per equity share (400%) for the financial year ended March 31, 2021. The date of payment of Dividend is fixed on June 18, 2021 and the dividend warrants will be dispatched before the date of payment, which will be payable, in lndia, at par at all branches of State Bank of lndia, irrespective of the amount.'], ['30-05-2017', '26-05-2017', '260%', 'Rs.2.6000 per share(260%)Dividend'], ['07-06-2016', '03-06-2016', '260%', ''], ['30-05-2015', '28-05-2015', '350%', 'Rs.3.5000 per share(350%)Dividend'], ['31-05-2014', '29-05-2014', '150%', 'Rs.15.0000 per share(150%)Dividend'], ['13-03-2014', '11-03-2014', '150%', 'Rs.15.0000 per share(150%)Interim Dividend'], ['30-05-2013', '28-05-2013', '415%', 'Dividend'], ['26-05-2012', '24-05-2012', '350%', 'Dividend'], ['24-05-2011', '20-05-2011', '300%', 'Dividend'], ['11-06-2010', '09-06-2010', '200%', 'Rs.20.00 per share(200%)Dividend'], ['09-02-2010', '05-02-2010', '100%', 'Rs.10.00 per share(100%)Interim Dividend'], ['12-06-2009', '10-06-2009', '290%', '290 % Dividend'], ['02-06-2008', '29-05-2008', '215%', '215% Dividend & A.G.M.'], ['15-06-2007', '13-06-2007', '140%', '140% Dividend'], ['21-06-2006', '19-06-2006', '140%', '140% Dividend']]}
